entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,229Chapters: 44/54Kudos: 56

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,596Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 42

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: PROPERTY of the WOLF
entry.summary:
Author: sera9Madora

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,684Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 89

Summary: -Derek Hale was an original werewolf, he was handsome, charming, the captain of the high school lacrosse team and he was from a rich family, he was the most popular boy in beacon hills high school... Who was Stiles? No one! A nerd that no one even looked at... but Stiles knew a truth that no one knew, he knew that the world he lived in was a novel and the main character was Derek... he didn't want to get involved with the main character and his troubles, but we do not control the fate...Genre: Fantasy, Werewolf, Yaoi (BL), Romance, Mystery

entry.title: Magical "Girl" 101 (A Guide by Stiles Stilinski)
entry.summary:
Author: Cute_Magical

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,333Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 87

Summary: When Stiles had been kicked out of the pack, he expected many things to happen. However, finding a magic book, gaining both a small and large flying magical companion, and a whole lot of unwanted responsibilities were not any of those things.Unlikely allies, magical abilities, newfound strength, and budding new relationships come together in Stiles's adventure of collecting clow cards.Oh, and he also gets rich… mostly through credit card fraud.You do not have to know Cardcaptor Sakura to read this fic. Updates weeklyy/Bi-weekly possibly sooner.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,650Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 66

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: The New Pool Boy
entry.summary:
Author: ladiekatie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,189Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: “Who are you?” comes a voice, it’s loud and strong.Stiles jumps back, pulling an earbud out from his ear and jerks around to see a man standing on the pool deck. He’s tall, and he’s hot.“I-” Stiles starts, but he can’t finish because he’s tripping on his words. “I’m.. I’m,” he points to the logo on his polo shirt, the uniform his dad has set up for them. “I’m with The Clean King. Are you Boyd? My dad talked to you about me coming instead of him. My dad, John Stilinski—uhh the Clean King himself—told me he talked to you?”“Right, well… I am… Boyd,” he says. “If you need anything, let me know.”Or the one where Stiles is tasked with cleaning Mr. Hale's pool, and ends up falling in love with his groundskeeper, Derek Boyd.

entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,224Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 55

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.  ---The story is finished and will be fully published either by me, or in case of my death, by my friend. You will not be left hanging. ---

entry.title: Sparked: Part 1
entry.summary:
Author: HitopCub

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 208,433Chapters: 16/44Kudos: 26

Summary: After The Alignment - a cosmic therapy session led by his and Derek's future son from an alternate reality - Stiles Stilinski's latent spark abilities are awakened. Now he's diving into his first six months of magical training with a prestigious coven, hidden on the 13th floor of a Silicon Valley tech giant.Stiles navigates a world where cutting-edge tech meets ancient magic. He's juggling unpredictable spark powers, bonding with fellow apprentices, and trying not to spill interdimensional secrets (like being married to Derek in another reality). Meanwhile, he's nurturing dreams of opening an apothecary in Beacon Hills.But it's not all cinnamon rolls and spell books. A sinister presence is sabotaging Stiles' training, and rumors of a spy threaten to tear the coven apart. Stiles must unravel these mysteries while mastering his abilities and grappling with growing feelings for Derek.With help from old and new friends, Stiles faces challenges that will shape his future as a spark. "Sparked: Part 1" is a tale of magic, mayhem, and coming-of-age, proving that in six months, anything can happen - especially when you're a spark-in-training with a knack for trouble and a head full of secrets.

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,980Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 872

Summary: Derek doesn't collect Stiles' breath in his lungs, doesn't drink it down and run his tongue over his teeth. He pulls back, pulls away, calms down. Tries to calm down. "Big date tonight?" he asks, like his wolf isn't howling and clawing at his insides.
